review: When I'm watching Amazon Prime Videos this is a great piece of equipment.  Clear picture and hardly ever any choppiness (this would be due to the internet connection, which I'm using wireless connection).  There are a few downfalls which, hopefully, will change in the near future:1) There is no HBO GO.  Not sure why since it looks like the other streaming TV boxes have it (Roku, etc.).  Looks like Amazon may be working on this, so I hope sooner than later.2) Had the box stop working for a day or two about a month after I started using it.  Customer service was quick and helpful and it's been flawless since.3) It's a bit deceiving that the Fire TV page claims this device is perfect for music, but you don't get access to your Prime Music streaming.  It plays Pandora just fine, but I got excited that I could make playlists online with the Prime Music (which I did) and listen to the songs through my TV speakers.  The only Amazon Music that it lets you play are those songs that you have purchased.  The customer service told me my concern was important to them, but no mention of a timetable for when (or if) I should expect to be able to use this feature of my Prime membership.
